replies.body: If it makes you feel any better I’m without a PC for a week so don’t get to do any of this weeks missions :(
Wow good to know Riot did not listen last time and JUST after they made a post on the nexus talking about missions, and the fact that they said they would fix shit like this.

these missions are so garbage....

stop making us try to team up with people... im an antisocial hermit god dammit.
I mean it's still bad enough that we are forced to change icons, the missions really don't help in making me want to bother with this shit.
